actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide for loans to small business concerns affected by the energy shortage.

summary.text: Empowers the Small Business Administration, under the Small Business Act, to make such loans (either directly or in cooperation with banks or other lending institutions) as the Administration may determine are necessary to assist, or to refinance the existing indebtedness of, any small business concern seriously affected by a shortage of energy-producing materials.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide for loans to small business concerns affected by the energy shortage.
